name: AllSaintsSermons
0:
”Alexa, open all saints sermons”
”Alexa, ask all saints sermons for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start all saints sermons”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: all saints sermons
des: Listen to the latest sermon from All Saints Presbyterian Church in Austin, TX. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're finished. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
